name: @convex-dev/platform
description: A client for the Convex Platform APIs

scripts.build: npm run generateApiSpec && node version-check.mjs && zshy
scripts.generateApiSpec: npm run generateManagementApiSpec && npm run generateDeploymentApiSpec && npm run generateLogStreamApiSpec
scripts.checkApiSpec: npm run checkManagementApiSpec && npm run checkDeploymentApiSpec && npm run checkLogStreamApiSpec
scripts.checkManagementApiSpec: openapi-typescript ./management-openapi.json --output ./src/generatedManagementApi.ts --root-types --root-types-no-schema-prefix --check || (echo 'Platform management API spec check failed. Run `npm run generateApiSpec` to fix.'; false)
scripts.checkDeploymentApiSpec: openapi-typescript ./deployment-openapi.json --output ./src/generatedDeploymentApi.ts --root-types --root-types-no-schema-prefix --check || (echo 'Platform deployment API spec check failed. Run `npm run generateApiSpec` to fix.'; false)
scripts.checkLogStreamApiSpec: openapi-typescript ./log-stream-openapi.json --output ./src/generatedLogStreamApi.ts --root-types --root-types-no-schema-prefix --check || (echo 'Platform log stream API spec check failed. Run `npm run generateApiSpec` to fix.'; false)

author: Convex, Inc. <no-reply@convex.dev>
